Foetal condition
/circle6 Count the FHR every half an hour.
/lozenge6 Count the FHR for one full minute. 
/lozenge6 Th  e rate should be preferably counted immediately aft er a uterine contraction. 
/lozenge6 If the FHR is below 120 beats per minute or above 160 beats per minute, it indicates 
foetal distress. Manage as indicated later under ‘Foetal Distress’ .
